item.description:
Ah December. That wonderful time of year when Bostonians run to and fro, all bundled up against the cold, trying to take care of 101 different holiday preparations and festivities. Just the time of year to get down, get on the scene, and get your groove on with the Chicken Slacks at the Cantab Lounge in Central Square in Cambridge.

"Taking cues from the Stax and Motown era, the Chicken Slackers perform covers of the masters like Sam and Dave and the mighty James Brown with super tight arrangements, superb musicianship that includes a swirling B3 organ and tasty guitar accompaniment and soulful (did I say SOULFUL!!!) vocal work. With an obvious solid starting point and great musicianship, I can easily guarantee you're going to be hearing a lot more from the Chicken Slacks Soul Revue. Good stuff!" Douglas Sloan - METRONOME magazine

Get on up and get there!
item.name: The Chicken Slacks @ the Cantab
